products.title: Allure Faux Silk Slate Roman Blind
products.description: The classic contrasting combo, black and white, can be put to good use in schemes both retro or contemporary. products.title: Eclissi Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Talk about sophistication. The eclissi charcoal roman blind is suave, moody and ever so sumptuous thanks to the combination of textured charcoal fabric and gentle grey borders. This blind helps to bring a softer side to a dark colour scheme, whilst the contrasting grey shades talk about sophistication.

products.title: Emilia Embroidered Grey Roman Blind
products.description: If your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss. The delicate blossoms are stitched into a mid grey fabric to create a stunning floral pattern. products.title: Galileo Faux Silk Silver Roman Blind
products.description: A roman blind is often considered a more traditional choice for window dressing, but this chic little blind proves just how modern and stylish they can be too. products.title: Real Silk Moonstone Roman Blind
products.description: The woven dupion silk with crepes and slubs looks sensational in this grey moonstone colour and is without doubt one of their best value blinds.
